ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup sweet pickles, halved and sliced
¼ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®), or to taste

cookingTips: Drain canned peas thoroughly and pat dry to prevent a watery salad
Add dressing just before serving to maintain crunch from peanuts and pickles
This salad is best served cold; chill for at least 30 minutes before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This retro salad combines sweet and savory elements. Coach the user on timing dressing addition to preserve texture and why proper draining matters.
